meanings.definition: A type of lemur found in Madagascar.
meanings.sent1: The sifakas jumped gracefully from tree to tree.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of sifakas in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The sifakas decided to have a dance-off to determine the best tree climber.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as agile as a sifakas leaping through the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The sifakas' white fur stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.sent1: Look at all those sifakas in the zoo!
meanings.sent2: The sifakas are known for their unique way of moving.
meanings.sent3: The sifakas gathered for a family photo, but no one could stay still.
meanings.sent4: The forest echoed with the calls of the sifakas.
meanings.sent5: The sifakas' playful antics entertained the visitors.
